verses.name: Amos 1:6
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Gaza, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they carried away captive the whole captivity, to deliver them up to Edom:

verses.name: Amos 1:7
verses.text: But I will send a fire on the wall of Gaza, which shall devour the palaces thereof:

verses.name: Amos 1:8
verses.text: And I will cut off the inhabitant from Ashdod, and him that holdeth the sceptre from Ashkelon, and I will turn mine hand against Ekron: and the remnant of the Philistines shall perish, saith the Lord God.
